attributes.additional_details: The current government must call a General Election due to the overwhelming lack of public trust and its repeated failure to uphold the promises made in the manifesto that secured its majority in the last election. The Prime Minister has lost the confidence of the nation and is no longer seen as an effective leader. Approval ratings continue to decline, and the public is increasingly unclear about the government’s goals or direction.
attributes.background:
Hold a general Election.
A General Election is urgently needed to restore democratic accountability and give the people a chance to decide the future of the country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
